flawed_nl_solution:
The town used to emit 800 pounds of carbon a year because 80 x 10 = <<80*10=800>>800
20 now take the bus because 80 x 0.25 = <<80*0.25=20>>20
65 people still drive because 80 - 20 = <<80-20=65>>65
Those 65 people create 650 pounds of carbon because 65 x 10 = <<65*10=650>>650
The town now emits 750 pounds of carbon because 100 + 650 = <<100+650=750>>750
The town emits 50 fewer pounds of carbon now because 800 - 750 = <<800-750=50>>50
#### 50

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 60, not 65. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
